MOUNIKA EDDALA 
emounika2021@gmail.com | +1(469)607-9167 | LinkedIn 
 
Professional Summary: 
 Around 8 years of experience in systems development, analysis, programming, and testing. 
 Over 5 years of enterprise application development experience using Java, Versata Logic Studio, 
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PL/SQL. 
 Experienced in designing, deploying, and managing secure API proxies using Apigee Edge, implementing 
traffic and security policies, and ensuring compliance with standards and regulations. 
 Extensive experience with ServiceNow, including API integration for RPA tasks such as data retrieval, 
ticket creation, and information updates. 
 Proficient in designing, developing, and deploying automation workflows using UiPath Studio, managing 
bot performance using UiPath Orchestrator, and integrating automation with legacy enterprise systems. 
 Developed Kibana Dashboards and Visualizations for bots deployed in production.

managing robot workloads using UiPath Work Queues.
